arts.ttl: Luton strike deal for January transfer – Medicals soon, five year contract on the table
arts.sum: Luton Town have struck a deal with RWDM in Belgium for centre-back Christ Makosso to join in the January transfer window. That’s according to journalist Sacha Tavolieri, who reports that the 20-year-old is set to undergo medical tests soon. arts.ttl: Luton Town ‘on verge of reaching agreement’ to sign player – Deal to cost Hatters €2.4m plus bonuses
arts.sum: RWD Molenbeek defender Christ Makosso is on his way to Luton Town in the winter market, according to Foot Mercato. The centre-back joined the second division Belgian club from FC Sochaux in the winter 2024 market and signed a contract until 2028.
